mapper.select: SELECT a.id , a.user_id , a.type , a.image_id , a.content , a.ingredient , i.org_file as image_url FROM article_master a , image i WHERE a.id = #{id} AND a.image_id = i.id AND a.use_yn = 'Y'
SELECT a.id , a.article_id , a.order , a.image_id , a.content , i.org_file as image_url FROM article_detail a , image i WHERE a.article_id = #{id} AND a.use_yn = 'Y' AND a.image_id = i.id
